Title: Establishes the New York state school transition reopening and redesign task force; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes the New York state school transition reopening and redesign task force; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the New York state school transition reopening and redesign task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
